contentruletype.name: Same as parent article
contentruletype.description: The rule is identical to the rule of the article the piece of content belongs to

contentruletype.name: Users can add or modify content without editor's approval
contentruletype.description: Users can modify the piece of content without requiring prior approval

contentruletype.name: Users can request modifications from editors
contentruletype.description: Modifications must be approved by the editor before they are effective

contentruletype.name: Users cannot request modifications from editors
contentruletype.description: The editor has elected not to receive modification requests from the system
